name: Front
description: Integrate with Front to list, send, list and more.
author: agenticmail

tools.name: List Conversations
tools.description: List conversations from Front. Returns subjects, statuses, assignees, and tags.

tools.name: Send Reply
tools.description: Send a reply to a Front conversation. The reply is sent as an email from the assigned inbox.

tools.name: List Inboxes
tools.description: List inboxes from Front. Returns inbox names, types, and addresses.

tools.name: Assign Conversation
tools.description: Assign a Front conversation to a specific teammate. Can also unassign by omitting assignee_id.

tools.name: Tag Conversation
tools.description: Add or remove tags on a Front conversation.
